name: Portland Cement (50kg)
description: High-quality Portland cement, perfect for all construction needs. 50kg bag with superior strength and durability.

name: TMT Steel Bars (12mm)
description: Thermo-Mechanically Treated steel bars with excellent tensile strength. Corrosion resistant and earthquake resistant.

name: Red Clay Bricks
description: Premium quality red clay bricks. Standard size with uniform dimensions and high compressive strength.

name: River Sand (1 Ton)
description: Clean and graded river sand, ideal for plastering and concrete work. Free from impurities.

name: 20mm Aggregates
description: High-grade 20mm crushed stone aggregates for concrete mixing. Uniform size and shape.

name: Safety Helmet
description: Industrial safety helmet with adjustable strap. Meets all safety standards. Available in yellow and white.

name: Power Drill Machine
description: Professional grade power drill with variable speed control. Includes drill bits and carrying case.

name: Concrete Blocks
description: Lightweight concrete blocks for wall construction. Excellent thermal insulation properties.

name: Steel Angle (40x40mm)
description: Structural steel angle for framework and support. Hot-rolled with uniform thickness.

name: Safety Gloves
description: Heavy-duty work gloves with reinforced palms. Comfortable fit and excellent grip.

name: White Cement (5kg)
description: Premium white cement for finishing work. Ideal for tile fixing and decorative applications.

name: Measuring Tape (10m)
description: Professional measuring tape with auto-lock feature. Clear markings in metric and imperial.
